short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get phone number for your Gmail account - all messages and v-mail will be forwarded to your gmail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get a dedicated secondary phone number to provide to clients and keep your personal phone number private. 

All messages and voice mails to that phone number will be forwarded to your Gmail.

Great for teachers, small business owners, lawyers, etc.  

Highlights:

✔️Send text messages directly from your phone

✔️Receive voice mail messages to your Gmail

✔️Reply to receive voice mail messages directly from your Gmail

✔️ Up to 1600 characters for all text messages sent 

NOTE: Only US and Canada phone numbers are supported. 

cloudHQ. Getting you faster email responses, 1 click at a time.
